description: Docker overview включает следующие экспортеры для каждого хоста с докером: Cadvisor, Docker state exporter, Node exporter

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen
Iowait - Waiting for I/O to complete
Nice - Niced processes executing in user mode
Steal - Time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment
System - Processes executing in kernel mode
User - Normal processes executing in user mode

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name", mode="system",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.legendFormat: System - Processes executing in kernel mode

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name", mode="user",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.legendFormat: User - Normal processes executing in user mode

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name", mode="nice",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.legendFormat: Nice - Niced processes executing in user mode

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name", mode="iowait",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.legendFormat: Iowait - Waiting for I/O to complete

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name", mode="irq",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name", mode="softirq",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name", mode="steal",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.legendFormat: Steal - Time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name", mode="idle",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$host_node_exporter_job_name",instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.legendFormat: Idle - Waiting for something to happen

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.legendFormat: Inactive - Memory which has been less recently used.  It is more eligible to be reclaimed for other purposes
Active - Memory that has been used more recently and usually not reclaimed unless absolutely necessary

title: Docker overview
